website_summaries.verdict: High-quality raw food that's free from antibiotics and hormones, and uses only human-grade ingredients.
pros: Safe to use for cats of all ages
Free from grains, gluten, and soy ingredients
Includes fresh ground bone to provide a calcium supplement
Easy to use, as the food is in a ready-to-eat format
cons: Food sometimes gives off an odor that some people will dislike having in the house

customer_reviews.title: formula change is horrible!
customer_reviews.text: we have been purchasing this food for 2 years and its drastically helped 3 cats with their fur and overall health. I had a feeling something was wrong when they started to not finish their food. After checking online i noticed that the bad is different and the formula changed. I cannot stand when companies pull this sneak attach on people. Cats are extremely finicky with food and sure enough they wont touch this stuff. 2 dang years and you not decide to pull this. Starting my journey again with a new company because this is not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Patryk

customer_reviews.title: they changed the recipe
customer_reviews.text: my cat really enjoyed this food for the past 2 years but the one i got last week seems to be a new recipe along with new product packaging. she absolutely hates it now and won't eat it. will not be purchasing any more
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Helps with cat's Ibs
customer_reviews.text: All of Primal freeze dry helps my Maine Coon cat with her Ibs and has stopped her diarrhea. She likes all flavors fairly well and most of the time eats every bit of it. To the person that said it doesn't have a smell...... Something must be wrong with their nose. It smells like pork sausage to me. The food is way over priced, but it helps my cat so I buy it. I recommend it for a cat with stomach problems. Been using this brand for 2 and half years.
customer_reviews.author: IOB

customer_reviews.title: My cat’s favorite plus super healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Kitty has tried a bunch of brands and flavors but Primal pork is her favorite! Food is easy to crumble in hands without too strong of a smell, and I add a bit of water or on occasion goat milk or cottage cheese when she’s being extra spoiled. Other freeze dried brands sometimes have some sharp bones that make me nervous, but I’ve never had that problem with Primal. Plus, Amazon has a great price for this quality cat food.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Justus

customer_reviews.title: My cat is in love...
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this. Per usual being a cat it took her a day to dive into a new food but now she gets so excited for meal time. Our vet recommended this for her rather than the prescribed vet food staying this would be more nutritious for her. Happy I got this for her.
customer_reviews.author: Dl

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Both my cats can be a bit picky and changing their diet on them doesn't always work. I generally but raw frozen patties, which they love most of the time. I keep quality cat food cans on hand when I am a little to rushed to thaw out their food. They only like the sheddred meat no pate. I think the pork was a good addition to their diet and it is quick to reconstitute back to a wet food.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Baker

customer_reviews.title: Our cat seems to like this one the most out of all the flavors
customer_reviews.text: Our cat seems to like this one the most out of all the flavors. We use a ziplock bag and a wine bottle to crush the bars.
customer_reviews.author: Fyne

customer_reviews.title: NEVER BUY PRIMAL ON AMAZON!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you buy Primal pet food don’t do it on Amazon!!!! Primal accepts returns for ANY reason at all, but I can’t return this or get a replacement. When I put it out for my cats they both RAN from it. I’ve tried 4 times and had to throw it away, guess I’ll throw the whole bag and NEVER order Primal on Amazon again...... 30 bucks down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: debra mcwilliams

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by our vet for skin health
customer_reviews.text: Our cat seemed to have allergies and was itching a lot. Vet recommended switching to this type of food and it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny W

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but so worth it
customer_reviews.text: My cat simply adores this food. I had to feed her canned food for about a week because I ran out of Primal and she ate it fine but she didn’t seem thrilled. However, when I broke this bag out, suddenly it’s like her whole furry little face lit up. She gets so chatty at mealtimes and the best part is, this food does wonders for her health. Her fur is nice and soft again and she has tons of energy. So glad I discovered this cat food.
customer_reviews.author: Holli Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Great product, terrible distributor.
customer_reviews.text: I usually feed this to my cat and he loves it, but this time he got unusual appetite after eating it, and later I realized this time they sent me dog version instead. Probably by mistake but it still triggered me.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Gao

customer_reviews.title: This food is dried, so it does not rot or degrade.
customer_reviews.text: Cut it or crush it into small pieces, add water, and it is ready. Contrary to canned food, it stays good for one whole day. I add more water than the instructions say, and my cat loves it. and he is quite picky.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir

customer_reviews.title: The smell is horrible
customer_reviews.text: This is probably a good product. However, I couldn't stomach the smell and neither could my cat. He looked at it, looked at me, tasted it and walked away with zero interest. which is too bad because it was pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Lebron

customer_reviews.title: Cat won't eat it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat would not eat it. I don't understand why first review was turned down. Hopefully Amazon doesn't just take positive reviews. SAD.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ingredients and flavor (I assume)
customer_reviews.text: This is the favorite of the primal foods for our cats. I enjoy the ingredients based on what is listed, but I wouldn't eat it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Harris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality cat food
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food! Easy to prepare and I feel better giving them a more natural diet.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda S.

customer_reviews.title: My cat is getting sick
customer_reviews.text: Normally I buy this and my cat loves the product. However, with my last purchase, halfway through the bag, my cat started to get sick every time she ate it. I'm worried the bag may have some viral or bacterial culture in it that is unsafe for cats.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: It's like crack for my cats
customer_reviews.text: Both my senior and young cats love this. My older cat won't lift her head out of the bowl until eating it all.
customer_reviews.author: Customer256

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cured the cat of long endured digestive weakness. All is normal with this food.
customer_reviews.author: tully Lynn

customer_reviews.title: My Cats are living proof of the quality of the ...
customer_reviews.text: My Cats are living proof of the quality of the food they eat. I moisten one serving and then mix in a handful of dry food. Doing this twice a day with fabulous result.
customer_reviews.author: Justin E.

customer_reviews.title: My kitties love these and so do I
customer_reviews.text: My kitties love these and so do I!!! They are super easy to break apart with a fork and then I just spray or pour water over the dehydrated pieces for my kitties to enjoy. Highly recommend! Super healthy and safe for your kitties too :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Another "paws up" for Pork flavor Primal Nuggets
customer_reviews.text: Izzy seems to like this pork variety well enough. It adds to the flavor rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great products that I have purchased from Amazon. No complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Banks

customer_reviews.title: Very happy when received
customer_reviews.text: This order took longer than expected. Very happy when received. My cats absolutely love the pork Primal Nuggets, besides the all natural ingredients are good for my cats. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Haines

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mix with Honest Kitchen for variation and my cats love it.
customer_reviews.author: Devoncats

customer_reviews.title: These were very dry and smelled old and stale. ...
customer_reviews.text: These were very dry and smelled old and stale. I couldn't crumble it (like you're supposed to), they were too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Kazu Clarke

customer_reviews.title: My Cat LOVES this one!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried over the years, to entice him with Primal FD Chicken/Salmon and the Turkey option, but he just hasn't been keen on them. He doesn't like salmon, or any fish, and I wish they had a chicken version, without fish. He also won't even try the frozen Pronto options. However, he absolutely loves this Pork version. I hope this love affair lasts because it's doing great things for his health. Thanks Primal, for giving our cats the Pork option! I wish Amazon's pricing was better. This is a bit more than the big box Pet Stores, which surprises me.
customer_reviews.author: flowerpower

customer_reviews.title: My picky cat is excited about this food!
customer_reviews.text: My eldest cat (19) loves this food! I pour a tbsp of water over the nugget, add a scoop of pumpkin baby food (it aids his digestion but also adds extra moisture, which is great), and break up the nugget with a fork until the whole thing is moist and uniform in color. He licks the bowl clean! At his age, food he'll particularly enjoy is important, because it's hard to keep an elderly cat's weight up. I'm really glad I tried this for him.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves pork.
customer_reviews.text: Softens easily and my cat with a sensitive stomach loves it. Thankful for pork cat foods, because Caroline has allergy to all poultry. Prefers this over fish flavored foods. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Scarab

customer_reviews.title: Cats won't eat
customer_reviews.text: we have 8 cats, and none of them will eat it.. It has no smell, which is weird..
customer_reviews.author: A I

product_meta.title: Primal Fpkfd14 Pet Foods Freeze-Dried Feline Pork Formula, 14 Oz.
product_meta.description: Primal Pork Formula Nuggets Grain-Free Raw Freeze-Dried Cat Food offers your hungry kitty all the benefits of a safe and wholesome raw-food diet—without you having to grind, chop, measure or mix the ingredients yourself! Taking great pride to source only the best ingredients, this tasty and nutritious diet is packed with naturally derived vitamins and minerals. The high-protein ratio appeals to your feline friend’s primal diet, and it’s an excellent way to maintain a proper weight and boost overall health. And best of all, it’s a breeze to serve, thanks to the naturally preserved nuggets—just add water! The proof comes in watching her lick the bowl clean while thriving happily and healthfully.
feature_bullets: Complete And Balanced Diet For All Life Stages
Pork Raised Without Antibiotics Or Added Hormones
Grain, Gluten, Corn, Wheat And Soy Free
Made In The Use Primal Freeze-Dried Formulas Are Produced Using Only The Freshest, Human-Grade Ingredients
